name: Cannonball Defense
description:
Created as part of the Wonderjam 4 game jam.

Controls: Mouse and left click

Load cannonballs into your only weapon, the cannon and defeat the red cubes.

It can be loaded with various combinations of cannonballs such as 6 small cannonballs, 3 medium cannonballs, 2 large cannonballs, or 1 large cannonball with either 2 small or 1 medium cannonball.

Then aim all loaded cannonballs at the cubes or nearby tiles, and fire.

Repeat until all cubes have been defeated.
